ComicInfo.Summary:
Peyton Parks learns the real reason that the man she's defending turned on his criminal cohorts, and just how dangerous his enemies are. And the Black Knight discovers that the law is not on her side either, forcing her to make a decision that will change everything.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Jason Metcalf & Juan Manuel Rodriguez | 2 | C | Cover C | Josh Burns | 3 | D | Cover D | Ryan Pasibe & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing | F | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Paul Green (a) & Hedwin Zaldivar (c) | Missing |
